answers.answer: They called me with my results the next day. Its called a glucose test lol
samething lol. then maybe ill call them tomorrow cuz ii took mine 9 days ago.
Yeah girl I would give them a call just to make sure
I got my results on both my 1hr and 3hr test about 2hrs after i left. I logged in online and seen my results then the ob called shortly after but i had already seen my results online.
My ob said if i passed my 1hr that he wouldn't call. He only calls if a patient fails.

see the didn't tell me nothing like that. I asked the lady that was taking my blood how long wud it take to get my results. she said in a week or so. still no call. maybe ii dont have gestational diabetes :-)
I found out at my next appointment which was only a few days  after.
